text_block_list.text:
Today was a day off. I had been browsing through a 
bookstore and before I realized it, it was this late.

I wanted to hurry home and start studying the books I 
bought. I took a shortcut, heading down a back alley――

……I couldn't say I had a good feeling about this. Even though 
I couldn't see anyone, I felt like someone was watching me.
choice_data_list: (I need to get out of here――)

text_block_list.text: Thinking that, I moved forward but then I heard a voice behind me.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
What a coincidence. 
Are you on your way home from shopping too?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Yes. I was looking for an accessory 
that would look good on my little sister.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
However, when it comes to off-the-shelf products, I can't seem to 
find anything suitable for her. Today's search resulted in zero.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Yes. I was disappointed, but since I bumped 
in to Trainer-san, things are looking up.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: ……If you'd like, how about returning to the academy together?

Of course I agree. However, it would be better to 
avoid this path. I didn't want to put her in danger――

text_block_list.name: Man in Pain
text_block_list.text: Ugh, my stomach……help me……

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: …… Is something wrong?
That pained voice just now……did Dream Journey not hear it?

I looked around, and then saw a man on his 
hands and knees on the ground in front of us.

text_block_list.name: Man in Pain
text_block_list.text: I-it hurts……

There were a few other people around besides us, but nobody moved 
to help him. They all glanced at him but quickly looked away.

text_block_list.name: Man in Pain
text_block_list.text: Y-yeah…… Sorry about that, my stomach hurts……ugh.

text_block_list.name: Man in Pain
text_block_list.text:
Thanks……you can just leave me by that door. 
I'll be fine if you can get me there……

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san.

Dream Journey's voice was calm and matter-of-fact. 
It was quite strange considering where we were.

I helped the man sit down beside the 
door before turning back to her.

text_block_list.name: Man in Pain
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, here is fine. 
Thanks. Ow ow……

text_block_list.name: Man in Pain
text_block_list.text:
No, I just drank too much. I'll be fine after resting a bit. 
Look, the girl with you is still waiting.

I looked back towards Dream Journey. Her eyes narrowed 
sharply for a moment but then her smile returned.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
……seems like he's used to this place, 
and that he's more worried about you.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: Let's head back, Trainer-san.

I looked back at the man one last time, he waved 
his hand but he looked slightly annoyed.

It seemed kind of rude but I was sure it was because he was drunk 
and had a stomach ache. And so we silently left that place.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: ……Trainer-san is……

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: Just as kind as you were back then, huh.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
The same as when you offered me your spot……even though 
you were helping him, you were still worried about me.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
It wasn't a safe place, so you kept looking 
around to make sure nothing happened.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Fufu. It's not that you're unaware, 
but you still try to be kind.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Normal, is it? 
……Yes, that's true.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: Certainly……you won't betray your own sense of right and wrong.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: I meant what I said.

When we returned to the dorms, we exchanged a quick 
goodbye. Dream Journey showed me the same smile as always.

I looked at the book I had with me. Since the 
bag was clear, the title was visible so it 
was obvious that the book was about training.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: That――

I attempted to interrupt Dream Journey before she could speak. 
I was sure that her words would be to show concern for me.

I didn't want her to think I was unreliable…… 
maybe that feeling was obvious in my awkwardness.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: ……――Fufu.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
So honest and sincere…… 
maybe it was something you were born with?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
From the bottom of my heart, I think it's something 
astonishing. And then, that……it should never be 
something lost due to malicious intent.
After saying that, Dream Journey left.

……I was certain her words were not a lie. It's just that 
there was another meaning behind those words as well.
――However
choice_data_list: Be careful on your way back!

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: ……Fufu. But the dorms are right here.

There didn't seem to be any hidden meaning 
behind the soft voice she replied with.

After I got home……I was putting down my things 
and was putting my keys away when I noticed.

I empty out my bags and my pockets, but it's not here. 
――My wallet. I was sure I put it away properly. I 
didn't put it in a place it could easily fall out of.

The events from the back alley flash through 
my mind. Maybe, that was……a pickpocket……

I sag my shoulders. There was no evidence to report to the 
police. Alone in the quiet room, I let out a big sigh……

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
……the more important it is that something 
not be lost, the more delicate it is.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
And the more essential the object, the more 
likely it will be shrouded in that scent.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
If something were to happen, I couldn't bear 
to watch. It hurts your heart……doesn't it?
